rukus.text: inna anzalna ilayka l-kitaba bil-haqi litahkuma bayna l-nasi bima araka l-lahu wala takun lil'khainina khasiman
wa-is'taghfiri l-laha inna l-laha kana ghafuran rahiman
wala tujadil ʿani alladhina yakhtanuna anfusahum inna l-laha la yuhibbu man kana khawwanan athiman
yastakhfuna mina l-nasi wala yastakhfuna mina l-lahi wahuwa maʿahum idh yubayyituna ma la yarda mina l-qawli wakana l-lahu bima yaʿmaluna muhitan
haantum haulai jadaltum ʿanhum fi l-hayati l-dun'ya faman yujadilu l-laha ʿanhum yawma l-qiyamati am man yakunu ʿalayhim wakilan
waman yaʿmal suan aw yazlim nafsahu thumma yastaghfiri l-laha yajidi l-laha ghafuran rahiman
waman yaksib ith'man fa-innama yaksibuhu ʿala nafsihi wakana l-lahu ʿaliman hakiman
waman yaksib khatiatan aw ith'man thumma yarmi bihi barian faqadi ih'tamala buh'tanan wa-ith'man mubinan
